results.title: Charades for Kids Peggable - No Reading Required Family Game
results.description: Get kids of all ages moving and laughing with Charades for Kids! This family game is designed for kids with three levels of clues to challenge children of all ages. Each card has a picture clue, so no reading is required. Act out a toothbrush, a cat or a bumble bee! Older children can read the simple words and phrases and act out actions like eating spaghetti or playing guitar! This game includes 150 charades cards, a sand timer, a game die, and complete instructions. Fun for 3 or more players, ages 4 and up. Get the family together for a hilarious game of Charades for Kids!

results.title: Lil' Curators Magnetic Pattern Block Book Road Trip Game - Educational IQ Challenge for Kids
results.description: Challenge your child's intelligence and creativity with Lil' Curators Magnetic Pattern Block Book Road Trip Game! This fun and educational game includes 7 pieces of shapes with 30 questions and answers each, for a total of 96 questions and answers. Featuring puzzles and questions, this game makes an ideal travel game with its small and convenient size, perfect for taking on trips. It also features diversified patterns to keep kids interested. The pieces are made of natural wood, with bright colors, non-toxic and odorless. This pre-school education toy is a great way to exercise logical thinking, fully tap the potential of children's creativity, and improve practical ability and hand-eye coordination. Perfect for family entertainment, this challenging and fun game is sure to be a hit with kids of all ages!

results.title: 31/15 pcs Magnetic Wood Fishing Toys Set - Educational Games For Kids
results.description: Enhance your child's creativity and imagination with this fun and educational 31/15 pcs Magnetic Wood Fishing Toys Set. Featuring a variety of colorful marine animals, this set is designed to help develop children's hand coordination ability, logical thinking, and knowledge. The perfect gift or clip set for every classroom, nursery, garden, home and more, this set is suitable for children over 3 years old. Includes 1 x 15 piece fishing game toy set and 1 x 31 piece fishing game toy set. Get yours today!

results.title: Hawker Wars / The Singaporean Dream Card Games - Original and Expansion Sets
results.description: Enjoy the best of Singapore's iconic hawker culture and food with Hawker Wars, a fun and interactive party game! Compete to cook some of Singapore's most delicious hawker dishes by drawing ingredient and action cards. Trade ingredients in the Black Market, cook dishes, and earn points. The first player to reach the target number of points wins! For 2 to 4 players, with a play time of 15-20 minutes. Each set includes 104 hand-drawn cards (4 Hawker Cards, 53 Ingredient Cards, 17 Dish Cards, 25 Action Cards, 5 Event Cards) and 1 instruction sheet. The Singaporean Dream by SGAG is also available, an interactive card game where you can sabo, complain and pay your way to be the perfect Singaporean! This set includes a memory trainer, a Tetris game console, a water game machine, a vintage hamster game, and more! Perfect for developing hand-eye coordination, creative thinking, and imagination. Great for both home and outdoor play, these toys are safe and durable. Get your child the perfect gift today and help them exercise their memory and learning abilities!

results.title: Bingo Set - Family & Party Games with Cage Balls, Cards, Counters, Chips & Chance Toys
results.description: Enjoy the classic game of Bingo with this deluxe set! This complete set includes 18 black and white Bingo cards, 150 Bingo chips in 5 colors, 2 Bingo boards, a black powder coated wrought iron cage, and 75 white plastic numbered balls. Easy to read with brightly-white balls featuring jumbo-sized numbering for easy reading. Portable size with the cage measuring 21cmx 18cm (including the base) to holds more than the average amount of Bingo balls and for ease of portability. Perfect for parties, barbeques, and family game nights. Bingo can help improve cognitive abilities, like concentration, alertness, memory and encourages socializing with others. Get your Bingo Set today!

results.title: Simon Electronic Memory Game - Fun Handheld Console with Lights and Sounds for Kids
results.description: Let the fun begin with Simon Electronic Memory Game! This handheld console is designed with lights and sounds to challenge your kids to repeat the patterns and advance to higher levels. It's perfect for team competitive play with friends and makes a great gift for kids aged 8 and above. With Repeat Mode, Built-in Suspension, and Classic Simon Game, you'll have endless hours of fun! Includes 1 Simon Classic Game Console measuring 5*5*2 cm/1.97*1.97*0.79in and weighing 50g. Note: Due to lighting effects and shooting angles, there may be color differences in the product. Please be aware of manual measurement tolerance.

results.title: Who Is It? Classic Family Guessing Game for Kids - Fun and Educational Board Game Toy Gift
results.description: Challenge your family and friends to a fun game of guessing! Who Is It? is a classic board game that makes kids think and encourages them to ask questions to narrow down the possibilities. Players secretly select one character and try to be the first to guess who their opponent picked. With easy-to-learn rules and a fun guessing game, this is a great game for parents and kids to play together. Includes 1 set of board game pieces. Made of durable ABS material and measures 24x25cm/9.45"x9.84". Perfect for family game night!

results.title: Whack A Mole Arcade Game - Interactive Family Fun for Kids & Adults!
results.description: Get ready for some serious family fun with our Whack A Mole Arcade Game! This classic game comes with two toy hammers, LED screen to indicate the score, and two game modes to choose from: Practice Mode (2 levels) and Arcade Mode (tokens are provided, up to 21 levels). This game is perfect for both kids and adults alike, and will bring hours of entertainment! Batteries operated: 3 X AA SIZE (NOT INCLUDED). Plus, this product is eligible for our exclusive gift wrapping service - simply add on this service at a nominal fee under our 'Add-on Deals' in this listing if needed. Get your Whack A Mole Arcade Game today!
